subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, who missed the British Open after injuring his left ankle, played the opening round of the P.G.A. Championship with the rising star Jordan Spieth, and both confronted a difficult course in Whistling Straits.
snippet: Rory McIlroy, who missed the British Open after injuring his left ankle, played the opening round of the P.G.A. Championship with the rising star Jordan Spieth, and both confronted a difficult course in Whistling Straits.
